question: The 2017 European Union Film Festival (EUFF) has started from which Indian city?
explanation: The 22nd edition of European Union Film Festival (EUFF) has started at Siri Fort Auditorium in New Delhi with an aim to improve cultural ties between India and European countries. The festival includes twenty-two films from Member States. This festival of award-winning European films includes perennial themes - the redemption of love, the resilience of youth, and the triumph of the human spirit in situations of adversity.
